content: this is a pdf pattern - digital download you will receive a download link via email due to the nature of patterns there are no returns or refunds all sales are final this pattern is available for free on my website with a video tutorial **the paid pattern includes ** granny square symbol chart and 10 different diagrams for better visualization of the techniques on exactly where to place your squares and how to fold your bags https //www jspcreate com/patterns/ crochet this fun shoulder tote bag using the easy breezy square this pattern gives instructions for two sizes small and large to suit all your needs it can be used as a purse a market bag or an overnight tote or the best option to carry your latest crochet project wonderful to make as gifts and work up quickly so you can try all the colour combinations these bags do not use much yarn and are perfect for stash busting skill level advanced beginner yarn samples use worsted weight or med size 4 1 - 50g ball of main colour a small amounts of contrast colours b thru h small bag uses less than 150g of yarn total large bag uses less than 250g of yarn total hook 5 00 mm us 8 / h other supplies scissors yarn needle for darning in ends finished sample sizes square size - 3 5 inches x 3 5 inches large bag - 15 inches wide x 17 5 inches long small bag - 10 inches wide x 12 5 inches long strap length options are 25 30 and 35 with suggestions on altering the strap length to your liking **paid pattern includes ** 21 page pdf pattern includes - easy breezy square written instructions for 4 colour square and 2 colour square - easy breezy square symbol chart - tote bag instructions for small and large tote - folding diagrams for small and large tote - 2 colour way options for each bag size 4 total - diagrams for each size and colour way in black and white printer friendly - diagrams for each size and colour way in full colour includes links to tutorials for techniques used thanks so much and enjoy jane + 1 https //youtu be/td45yljmc20 1 1 https //youtu be/td45yljmc20
